e-commerce-platform.title: E-Commerce Platform
e-commerce-platform.shortDescription: A full e-commerce website with product listings, cart functionality, and CMS-driven content.
e-commerce-platform.longDescription: Built a complete e-commerce experience featuring dynamic product catalogs, individual product pages with rich media, shopping cart functionality, and CMS-managed content. The platform was designed for scalability with SEO-friendly routing and responsive layouts that work seamlessly across all devices.
e-commerce-platform.problem: The client needed a modern, fast-loading e-commerce solution that could be easily updated by non-technical team members while maintaining excellent performance and SEO rankings.
e-commerce-platform.solution: Leveraged Next.js for server-side rendering and static generation, combined with Sanity CMS for content management. This gave the team full control over product listings, descriptions, and media while ensuring lightning-fast page loads and excellent search engine visibility.
highlights: Dynamic product catalog with filtering and search
Responsive UI optimized for mobile and desktop

carpentry-business-website.title: Carpentry Business Website
carpentry-business-website.shortDescription: A professional business website for a carpentry company showcasing services, projects, and driving conversions.
carpentry-business-website.longDescription: Designed and developed a professional business website for a carpentry company, focused on showcasing their craftsmanship, services, and completed projects. The site was built to drive inquiries and establish credibility with a clean, professional design.
carpentry-business-website.problem: The carpentry business needed an online presence that would showcase their work quality, list their services clearly, and convert visitors into leads through effective contact forms.
carpentry-business-website.solution: Created a fast-loading static site with Next.js, featuring a beautiful gallery section, detailed service pages, and strategically placed contact forms. Tailwind CSS ensured a polished, consistent design throughout.

back-office-dashboard.title: Back Office Dashboard
back-office-dashboard.shortDescription: An internal back-office system for managing content, business data, and daily operations.
back-office-dashboard.longDescription: Built an internal administration dashboard for managing business content, data, and operations. The system features data tables, forms for content management, and a modular architecture designed for extensibility.
back-office-dashboard.problem: The team needed an internal tool to manage content, track business data, and streamline daily operations without relying on spreadsheets or manual processes.
back-office-dashboard.solution: Developed a modular React dashboard with Sanity CMS integration, providing structured data management, clear navigation, and role-based views. The component architecture ensures easy maintenance and feature additions.

multi-page-business-website.title: Multi-Page Business Website
multi-page-business-website.shortDescription: A large-scale business website with 20+ pages, structured navigation, and CMS-backed content.
multi-page-business-website.longDescription: Architected and built a large-scale business website featuring over 20 pages with structured navigation, SEO planning, and CMS-backed content management. The project required careful planning of information architecture and scalable routing.
multi-page-business-website.problem: The business required a comprehensive website with many pages covering different services, locations, and information sections, all needing to be easily maintainable and SEO-optimized.
multi-page-business-website.solution: Used Next.js with Sanity CMS to create a scalable, content-managed website. Reusable layout components and a clear routing structure made the site easy to maintain and extend, while SEO-ready structure ensured strong search visibility.
